# kvImageARGB16U

**Global Variable**

Any 16-bit unsigned, four-channel interleaved buffer.

## Declaration

```swift
var kvImageARGB16U: vImageARGBType { get }
```

## Discussion

This type doesn’t specify channel order.

## Constants

- **init(_:)**: Creates a new ARGB type.
- **init(rawValue:)**: Creates a new ARGB type with an unsigned integer value.
- **rawValue**: The unsigned integer raw value.
- **kvImageARGB16Q12**: Any 8-bit four-channel interleaved buffer.
- **kvImageARGB8888**: Any 16-bit signed fixed-point, four-channel interleaved buffer.
